info.title: CRM Limits Tracking
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: Before importing a large file of contacts, you want to check how many contact records you've created compared to your account's limit.
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the limits tracking API to view limits and usage for CRM data including records, associations, pipelines, and properties.

get.description: Returns limits and usage for custom association labels

get.summary: Read record association limits between two objects
get.description: Returns records approaching or at association limits between two objects

get.summary: Read record association limits from an object
get.description: Returns objects for which the from object has records approaching or at association limits
Returns limits and usage for custom object schemas
Returns limits and usage per object for custom properties
Returns objects with records approaching or at association limits
Returns limits and usage per object for records
Returns limits and usage per object for pipelines
Returns overall limit and per object usage for calculated properties

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate
